Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~nnao - you might want to take a look at https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/10181/ and do things in a similar fashion. Note I've already taken care of the Makefile is you add a metadata sub-package

Action.author: nnao
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 Thank you for advice. It helps me a lot! I have a question. Do I need to change Makefile in configtxgen target for showing the version at "make configtxgen"

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~nnao - you won't have to change the Makefile
